description: Rod Daily and Tyler Torro are training at the gym, with Rod trying to pick up a few tips from Tyler. While doing ab work, Tyler's hard on grows to epic proportions, so much so that Rod can't help but notice... especially since Rod has been staring at Tyler's dick the whole time! Well it seems one good spot deserves another, so after Tyler has finished his reps, Rod takes a turn putting in some 'work'. Before too long, Tyler is ready to take Rod's sweet ass for a ride, and all of a sudden, this gym workout has denigrated into a full on man to man fuckfest!
title: Hitting Rod Bottom
